RelatedSentence: May 19 ( Reuters ) - GoPro Inc , which makes wearable action cameras and accessories , filed with U.S. regulators on Monday to raise up to $ 100 million in an initial public offering of common stock .

May 19 ( Reuters ) - GoPro Inc , which makes wearable action cameras and accessories , filed with U.S. regulators on Monday to raise up to $ 100 million in an initial public offering of common stock .
